msContents.summary: Record of arbitration hearings between Johannes Tsoker and Philemon Thekla. Published by A. A. Schiller in 1968 (see bib.). Related to SB VI 8988.

msItemStruct.note: 9 parts cut from a roll and glued to cardboard. Last fragment is blank. On the back is a letter from E. A. Wallis Budge dated 27 April 1932.

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University c. 1932. Old numbers: Papyrus ; Inv.

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

listBibl.bibl:
Schiller, A. A. 1968. "The Budge Papyrus of Columbia University," JARCE 7: 79-118 (ed. pr.) Cf. Schiller, A. A. 1961. Actes Xe congres international des papyrologues, pp. 193-200.
idem. 1964. "The Interrelation of Coptic and Greek Papyri: P BU and P BM Inv. Nos. 2017 and 2018." In Braunert, H. ed. _Studien zur Papyrologie und antiken Wirtschaftsgeschichte_ (Bonn, Habelt): 107-119.
Allam, S. 1992. “Observations on Civil Jurisdiction in Late Byzantine and Early Arabic Egypt.” In Johnson, J. ed. _Life in a Multicultural Society_ (Chicago, The Oriental Institute): 1-8.
